attributes.action: Make it illegal for teachers to deny students access to the toilets.
attributes.additional_details: It’s unhealthy for anyone, especially children to hold it in when they need the toilet. Many children have experienced problems regarding their bladders and bowels because of denied access to bathroom. And it’s downright unfair that some young developing girls aren’t allowed to use bathrooms during their menstrual cycle.
attributes.background: Going to the toilet is a basic human right and for children to be denied access to that is unfair. They should be allowed to go to the toilet when they need as it’s not their fault when their bladders decide it’s time for them to go.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for a similar action:

Require schools to allow students to have access to the toilet during lessons:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643422

Give students a legal right to access school toilets when they have their period:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637669
